1419.title: BBC may collect your device fingerprint.

tosdr.tldr: "We collect some data automatically - Like [...] what browser and device you’re using."

7844.quoteText:
BBC Privacy and Cookies Policy

Page updated: August 2019
7844.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms

7845.quoteText:
g. Moral rights

When you upload a creation, you give up your moral rights to it. That means we can:

  • Use your creation without identifying you as the creator
  • Edit or change your creation and you won’t be able to say we’ve treated it in a “derogatory” way.
7845.title: You sign away moral rights

7846.quoteText: Stopping all cookies might mean you can’t access some BBC services, or that some of them might not work properly for you.
7846.title: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

8350.quoteText: to update you on any changes to the BBC’s policies, practices and Terms of Use
8350.title: BBC will use Information to contact users about policy changes

tosdr.case: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
tosdr.tldr:
BBCs Privacy and Cookies Policy states it will use Personal Information to contact users about policy changes

Point 7 in the Privacy and Cookies Policy:
7. When will the BBC use my information to contact me?
We might use your information to contact you about different things, like:
to update you on any changes to the BBC’s policies, practices and Terms of Use

8408.quoteText:
Can I delete my information?

This depends on what information you're talking about.

a. If you're talking about BBC account

You can delete your account. Your account information is immediately deleted.
8408.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time

10797.quoteText:
Where we store your information

Some companies that provide services to us run their services from outside the UK and the European Economic Area. We only let that happen if we are satisfied with their levels of security. Keep in mind that when you give us personal information it could be being transferred, stored or processed in a location outside the UK and the EEA.
10797.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

tosdr.case: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

10798.quoteText:
We share personal information about you to others but we follow some rules

The main rule is we will never sell your personal information to anyone.
10798.title: This service does not sell your personal data

tosdr.case: This service does not sell your personal data

11585.quoteText:
We also use functional, performance and advertising cookies to make your experience more enjoyable. You can switch these on or off at any time and you can always change your mind. We’ll only use them if you’ve agreed.

Bear in mind there are some other cookies out there from other companies. These "third-party cookies" might track how you use different websites, including ours.
11585.title: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions

tosdr.case: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions

11586.quoteText:
We do share it with others in these ways:

a. When you make something public

Like post a comment which the public can see.

b. When we use other companies to power our services

In order for us to give you quality experiences and to understand how you're using our services we often use other companies to process your personal information on our behalf.
11586.title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

11587.quoteText:
You can:

  • ask us what personal information we hold about you
  • ask us to correct or delete your personal information
  • tell us to stop using your personal information
11587.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

tosdr.case: You can request access and deletion of personal data

11588.quoteText:
• to help us understand how people are using our services, so we can make them better
  • to deliver advertising to websites outside of the UK
  • to help us personalise the BBC to you by remembering your preferences and settings
11588.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

tosdr.case: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes
